name: Publicly Accessible Alibaba ApsaraDB Instances
query: { dbInstances( where: { cloudProvider: "alibaba" publicAccessBlocked: false whitelist: { rules_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
